author: gbrown
msg: Add initial rendering support to TextAreaSkin2; minor optimization to LabelSkin.

author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Don't build neon with libproxy for now.
On my system it ends up pulling -L/usr/local/lib into LDFLAGS, causing
run-time conflicts with libraries installed by 3rd party software managed
by OpenBSD ports. Fixes local test failures with the BDB backend.

author: erwan
msg: merge by hand r993407 -- Impossible to check DB by webtools
